name: Embered Worlds
description:
Frustrating collisions, janky spikey rocks, multi jump fire orbs that will clip you into the ceiling! All that and more await you in “Embered Worlds”. This game is still in early development, but I hope you will get a taste of the direction it is heading in with this little preview, as the custodian of planets cores it is your job to collect the scattered core fragments in each level to save the planet, while you start on a reasonably lush and hospitable planet as the game develops future worlds will harbour more hostile mechanics and hazards to navigate and overcome!

Features:

  • Challenging platforming section
  • Multi jump fire balls
  • Inferno launch pads
  • A vibrant planet to save (with more in production)
  • Rock spikes of doom

Release Date

13th November 2019

 

Platform

PC Windows

Contact

 William.c.lawrence@hotmail.com

Bio

Hello! My name is Will and I am an art student at MDS, formerly an IT professional I have ditched my boring old career to make the best damn games you’ve ever played… eventually.

In the mean-time I hope you enjoy my early projects, Embered Worlds is my first game as I attempt to tackle the platforming genre through game maker studios 2
